features: LUXURIOUS: The Exclusive Home Velvet Heavyweight Hidden Tab Top Curtains offer a luxurious look for your windows in any room. The light-filtering fabric filters light beautifully into your space while also adding color and texture to your decor.
LIGHT FILTERING OPACITY: light filtering opacity provides privacy to your room while still allowing natural light to shine through. It's perfect for diffusing light beautifully into your space.

3 HANGING OPTIONS: Drape these curtain panels (1) from the rod pocket for a classic look, (2) using the hidden tabs to create an elegant pleated effect, or (3) using clip rings for easy, slide open and closed (clip rings are not included). Fits up to 1.5" diameter rod.
SET OF TWO CURTAIN PANELS: Includes two (2) curtain panels, each measuring 52"W x 84"L. CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Spot clean or hand wash as needed; iron on low heat setting

PLUSH VELVET: These well-crafted, plush velvet panels enhance any space in your home with vivid color and lavish texture, Hang them in your living room, dining room, bedroom, office, hallway, or entryway.
body.description: The Velvet Heavyweight Hidden Tab Top Window Curtain Panels in blush bring a luxurious look and feel to any room and offer a simple way to add color and texture to your decor. These plush velvet panels have a light-filtering opacity and filter light beautifully into your space while also providing privacy. Hang 3 ways: using the rod pocket, the back tabs, or with curtain clips (not included). For proper look and fullness, the curtains should measure 2-3 times the width of your window.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Exclusive Home Curtain Panels Exclusive Home's variety of curtains are limitless. With geometric curtains, floral curtains, medallion curtains, and other patterned curtains in multiple sizes and constructions, there isn't an interior design or home decor we can't complete. From classic solids to today’s top fashion trends, you are sure to find window panels to fit any look, mood, or style to complete your home décor. Curtain Rods From classic to contemporary designs, you are sure to find Exclusive Home curtain rods that will fit any look, mood or style and complement your window decor. Like millions of customers already have, let our designs be the anchor for each room in your home! Our window hardware collections are available in a variety of styles, colors and sizes. Indoor/Outdoor Let your worries blow away in the wind! Exclusive Home has the perfect outdoor curtains for your patio, lanai, porch, or any other outdoor area. Featuring a multitude of colors and designs, our outdoor curtains bring extra fashion and style to any outdoor living space. Our outdoor curtain panels drape beautifully and offer a UV Ray protectant. These beautiful panels are the ultimate finishing touch to any pergola, cabana, covered patio, gazebo, dock, beach home, or any outdoor extension of your home. Kids Exclusive Home's bright and fun kids curtains are perfect to help keep the sun out for that midday nap! With a variety of colors and sizes, there is no kid decor we can't match. Offering a variety of styles in chevron, geometric, and stripe designs. Impress your family and friends with your kid's rooms new curtains!

Why Exclusive Home: Our ready-made curtains are offered in an array of standard sizes sure to accompany the window and setting for any setting. You will find widths per panel ranging from 40 inches to 108 inch patio panel, and lengths offered in 63", 84", 96" and 108". Regardless of your application, you are sure to find ready to hang curtains for your home from us! Why Exclusive Home: With Exclusive Home Curtains quality is paired with fabric that provides texture, depth, and sophistication. These constructions include jacquards, linen, burlap, sheer, thermal / blackout, layered curtains, silk and faux silks, polyester and poly blends, and cotton and cotton blends. Further, we offer multiple top treatment options, including grommets, rod pocket / pole top, back tab, pinch pleat, clip ring, and more. Why Exclusive Home: After producing and selling millions of curtains for well over a decade, the Exclusive Home product line is held to the highest quality standards for finished product. With every purchase will receive a professionally constructed curtain set that is sure to hang beautifully. Why Exclusive Home: From sheer to fully lined blackout, and everything in between, Exclusive Home Curtains has the window treatments to fit the light blocking needs you have. For simplicity, we utilize an opacity rating for each product to simplify the items light blocking qualities. Purchase with confidence, knowing how light will be filtered with each panel. Sizes Construction Quality Opacity

Exclusive Home Curtains - About Us: Exclusive Home Curtains is North America’s leading supplier of home textiles and ready-made drapery for delivering high fashion designs, patterns, varying textures, and colors in an affordable luxury quality that today’s consumers expect. From classic solids to today’s top fashion trends, you are sure to find window panels to fit any look, mood, or style to complete your home décor project. We offer an array of fabric constructions as well, including jacquards, linen, burlap, sheer, thermal / blackout, silk and faux silks, polyester and poly blends, and cotton and cotton blends. These constructions are offered in varying designs and colors including solids, prints, geometric, gates, medallions, vertical stripes, horizontal stripes, embroidery, textures, thickness, lengths, widths, and burnouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovey, quality curtains at a GREAT price!
reviews.reviewText: Love these! Nice weight without being cumbersome for a smaller rod (1") at 48" wide. These really make my daughter's room feel finished. The fabric feels wonderful, but it is absolutely not blackout. I was aware of this because of the reviews and it was not a feature I was concerned about since my daughter's room doesn't face direct sun at any point in the day. They have a few wrinkles, but I imagine they will disappear after a few days of hanging. The color is represented well in the photos and is a peachy color when the light shines through but it's a soft blush color otherwise. We put LED's around the window and they glow from behind the curtains adding some drama.I bought the 93" curtains (I think that's correct - it was 90 something) and have 8ft (96") ceilings. I hung the rod 2 1/4 inches from the ceiling and the curtains puddle slightly. I thought I would hem them to kiss the floor, but after hanging I like that I can pull them away from the window and the extra fabric helps keep them in place without needing hooks, so I think I'll keep them long.The loops at the back make these hang so beautifully and make such pretty pleats with zero effort. These are a steal and I can't imagine anyone not being happy with them. If your on the fence, you should do it!(:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are just beautiful! Thick and very elegant looking. The color is spot on. Heavy as well. Love them! But had to return (not quite right with my decor colors) them for the winter white ones.The winter white drapes arrived and hung. They are such a different quality than the blush colored. Not as thick, nor heavy and were so hard to steam out the lots and lots of wrinkles. I do not like them as well as the blush but will keep simply because the color works better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Curtains for the price
reviews.reviewText: Great curtains - I bought the Blush pink velvet for a client - the curtains arrived quickly and are beautiful quality, especially for the low price. The color is very pretty and accurate to the photos on line. The only negative was the way they were shipped - they were packaged & delivered in nothing more than clear flimsy plastic wrap, not much more than Saran Wrap. The plastic had a hole in it, exposing the velvet curtain to the elements & the delivery guy left it on my step in the pouring rain (I have a covered porch where it would have been protected if he'd tossed it 6" further in) - I realize that the seller of these curtains can't be held responsible for the carelessness of the delivery guy, but, slightly sturdier packaging would have been nice. Anyway, needless to say, when I took the curtains out of the plastic they had a big wet patch/water stain on them - I hung the curtains over a dining room chair & let them air dry (forcing myself to resist the urge to rub them dry with a towel or throw them in the dryer) & amazingly they did air dry without a hint of a water stain! So, all good, very happy, & my client is very happy too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, high-quality curtains
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are simply gorgeous, with a silky soft, smooth nap that is of higher quality than more expensive brands, which sometimes feel like velour. They have a good weight to them and the color is saturated and rich. They make my room look elegant and expensive. I bought the ones in teal since some of the reviews said the navy looked too dark, but the teal looks a little lighter in person. While they are not blackout curtains, they do not let light through despite what the description states.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and perfect light filtering
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The pink is the perfect shade of blush, not too pink, not too dull. And they filter light perfectly, giving us privacy in our den without making the room too dark. I purchased 2 sets of panels and 1 of the panels has blue dot stains in various areas. I didn't notice them until I started to steam them. Had I noticed them sooner I would probably have exchanged them, but it doesn't bother me enough to go through the trouble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Navy are beautiful. Great quality, heavy weight, room darkening. I'm shocked at rhe quality for less than $30 for two panels. Very lux looking and so soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrong color & Only came with one panel
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the teal. In the pictures online it appeared much darker, in person it’s much more blue and bright. It also only came with one panel. I ordered a second pack to see if it worked before returning. They are very beautiful, and good quality. Just not the color I wanted , and didn’t receive both panels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024

reviews.reviewText: The Navy curtains are NOT navy - they're light blue. Periwinkle. Even the package says "marine"
